summary: Lets you make a decent living out of hunting.
descriptionHtml:
~Name~
Ultimate Hunter's Overhaul

~Version~
1.0

~Change Log~
1.0 - Initial Release

~Description~
I have seen a few mods that change the prices of items you get from animals, such as Pelts and Meat, and decided to try my hand at a mod like that, so some credit for those mods for giving me the idea.

UHO (Ultimate Hunter's Overhaul) changes the prices of meat, pelts, ect, you get from animals, so you can make a decent living off of hunting, perfect for Ranger type characters.
The Prices differ from how tough the animal is to kill.
Say a mammoth or bear, the prices of there meat and hides, ect, with be worth a lot.
But a horker's meat and tusks will be worth way less, considering how slow and easy to kill.

Items and Prices

Bear Pelt - 200
Cave Bear Pelt - 250
Snow Bear Pelt - 300
Bear Claws - 75
Deer Hide - 100
Deer Hide2 - 90
Deer Pelt - 100
Venison - 100
Large Antlers - 75
Small Antlers - 75
Horse Meat - 120
Horse Hide - 100
Mammoth Snout - 220
Mammoth Tusk - 200
Mammoth Tusk Powder - 180
Mammoth Cheese Bowl - 80
Werewolf Pelt - 300
Troll Fat - 100
Wolf Pelt - 75
Ice Wolf Pelt - 100
Sabre Cat Pelt - 120
Snow Sabre Cat Pelt - 150
Sabre Cat Eye - 75
Sabre Cat Tooth - 75
Horker Meat - 80
Horker Tusk - 50
Goat Meat - 45
Goat Hide - 35
Fox Pelt - 25
Snow Fox Pelt - 35
Cow Hide - 40
Beef - 35
Mudcrab Chitin - 35
Slaughterfish Scales - 75
Slaughterfish Egg - 75
Rabbit Leg - 25
Hawk Feathers - 95
Hawk Beak - 95
Salmon Meat - 45

~Author Notes~
If I missed anything Animal loot wise please let me know in the comments.

~Compatibility~
This mod is not compatible with any mod that changes the price of the items listed in the Description.

~Bugs~
None known so far.

~Recommended Mods~

More Arrows by Cupressi
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11613/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D11613&pUp=1

~Credits~
Bethesda for making Skyrim

From: The Lone Wolfe
